ComicInfo.Summary:
Other-dimensional vampire slaying comic shop owner Katie Carva literally reboots when the Vampblades transplant an alternate dimension version of Detroit to replace her recently destroyed city! Now Katie must survive the Glarkian space vampire invasion all over again… PLUS deal with a second version of herself that came along for the ride!! It’s double the Vampblade, double the fun!
The hit series reboots with a new artist and 4 covers, each with a risqué variant – including one by Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace), plus a blank sketch variant!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------------------|----------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Marcelo Costa | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Costa | 2 | | C | Season 1 Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | R.B. White | 3 | | D | Season 1 Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | R.B. White | 4 | | E | Season 2 Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Richard Garcia | 5 | | F | Season 2 Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Richard Garcia | 6 | | G | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 7 | | H | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 8 | | I | Blank Sketch Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | None | 9 |
*Notes* Overall issue #26. The digital edition (3/21/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: Down the Vamp Hole Part One
